speaker: Jamie
text: I wish I had tested that edge case more thoroughly. It completely slipped through.
ipa: aɪ wɪʃ aɪ hæd ˈtɛstɪd ðæt ɛdʒ keɪs mɔɹ ˈθɝəli. ɪt kəmˈplitli slɪpt θɹu.
stress: I WISH I had TESTED that EDGE CASE more THOROUGHLY. It COMPLETELY SLIPPED THROUGH.
linking:
"had tested" → /hæd ˈtɛstɪd/ (d + t linking)
"slipped through" → /slɪpt θɹu/ (t + th linking)

speaker: Aria
text: Same… If only we had reviewed that logic together before merging.
ipa: seɪm… ɪf ˈoʊnli wi hæd ɹɪˈvjud ðæt ˈlɑdʒɪk təˈɡɛðɚ bɪˈfɔɹ ˈmɝdʒɪŋ.
stress: SAME… If ONLY we had REVIEWED that LOGIC TOGETHER before MERGING.
linking:
"had reviewed" → /hæd ɹɪˈvjud/ (d + r linking)
"logic together" → /ˈlɑdʒɪk təˈɡɛðɚ/ (k + t linking)

speaker: Jamie
text: Honestly, I wish I had taken that weird log warning seriously. I thought it was just noise.
ipa: ˈɑnəstli, aɪ wɪʃ aɪ hæd ˈteɪkən ðæt wɪɹd lɔɡ ˈwɔrnɪŋ ˈsɪɹiəsli. aɪ θɔt ɪt wəz dʒəst nɔɪz.
stress: HONESTLY, I WISH I had TAKEN that WEIRD LOG WARNING SERIOUSLY. I THOUGHT it was just NOISE.
linking:
"had taken" → /hæd ˈteɪkən/ (d + t linking)
"thought it" → /θɔt ɪt/ (t + i linking)

speaker: Aria
text: I know. I wish I had double-checked the mobile flow — the bug only shows up on smaller screens.
ipa: aɪ noʊ. aɪ wɪʃ aɪ hæd ˈdʌbəl tʃɛkt ðə ˈmoʊbəl floʊ — ðə bʌɡ ˈoʊnli ʃoʊz ʌp ɑn ˈsmɔlɚ skɹinz.
stress: I KNOW. I WISH I had DOUBLE-CHECKED the MOBILE FLOW — the BUG only SHOWS UP on SMALLER SCREENS.
linking:
"had double-checked" → /hæd ˈdʌbəl tʃɛkt/ (d + d linking)
"shows up" → /ʃoʊz ʌp/ (z + u linking)

speaker: Jamie
text: Yeah, and if only I had added proper error handling, the app wouldn’t have crashed.
ipa: jæ, ænd ɪf ˈoʊnli aɪ hæd ˈædəd ˈprɑpɚ ˈɛɹɚ ˈhændlɪŋ, ði æp ˈwʊdənt həv kræʃt.
stress: YEAH, and if ONLY I had ADDED PROPER ERROR HANDLING, the APP WOULDN’T have CRASHED.
linking:
"had added" → /hæd ˈædəd/ (d + a linking)
"wouldn’t have" → /ˈwʊdənt həv/ (t + h linking)

speaker: Aria
text: We both made assumptions. I wish we had slowed down instead of rushing to meet the sprint deadline.
ipa: wi boʊθ meɪd əˈsʌmpʃənz. aɪ wɪʃ wi hæd sloʊd daʊn ɪnˈstɛd əv ˈɹʌʃɪŋ tu mit ðə spɹɪnt ˈdɛdlaɪn.
stress: We BOTH made ASSUMPTIONS. I WISH we had SLOWED DOWN instead of RUSHING to MEET the SPRINT DEADLINE.
linking:
"had slowed" → /hæd sloʊd/ (d + s linking)
"rushing to" → /ˈɹʌʃɪŋ tu/ (g + t linking)

speaker: Jamie
text: Lesson learned. Still, I wish we didn’t have to find out the hard way.
ipa: ˈlɛsən lɝnd. stɪl, aɪ wɪʃ wi ˈdɪdənt hæv tu faɪnd aʊt ðə hɑɹd weɪ.
stress: LESSON LEARNED. STILL, I WISH we DIDN’T have to FIND OUT the HARD WAY.
linking:
"didn’t have" → /ˈdɪdənt hæv/ (t + h linking)
"find out" → /faɪnd aʊt/ (d + o linking)
